comments.body: We should consider moving the v2 source API into the catalyst module as well. That would fix these links, but it a much larger issue. I'll plan on bringing it up at the next v2 sync.
comments.diffHunk:

* Truncating a table removes all existing rows. *

- * See {@link org.apache.spark.sql.sources.v2.writer.SupportsTruncate}.
